page.title: 15LIFESTYLES CONT
page.content: The average{size of a family}is four and one girl described her life at home as" Pretty hectic,arguments are always occuring. This sometimes leads to the slamming of doors and i am sure that other families have the same problems.Arguments usually happen over which T.V.channel each of us want to watch or remarks that we say to each other.Family life can also be very happy especially on{special {occasions}such as birthdays,Christmas,anniversaries,etc. ".There are many{fashions}around the area at the moment,with the younger population taking the lead.Skin tight jeans and mini-skirts are still popular with the girls (and boys). The punk craze is still lingering on - but not so conspicuous as in recent years.
